website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re pulling a Star Destroyer from orbit, or slaughtering Wookie warriors on Kashyyyk, this destructive adventure will hook fans of the Force.
pros: A new story starring Darth Vader’s secret apprentice
Available on PC, Xbox 360, and PS3
cons: The game’s controls could be a bit smoother

customer_reviews.title: Force lightning yourself to buy this...
customer_reviews.text: The Force Unleashed, while not a phenomenal, stands with it's sequel, KOTOR and Jedi Knight II as one of the best Star Wars games to date. It makes good use of force powers and action, while allowing you to explore the Dark Side of the force. Definitely a nice break from being a goody-goody all the time. Graphically, it's third person, with reasonably decent models and texturing. Controls are generally good, and game play is fast and furious most of the time. A good buy, even if not necessarily bargain bin priced.
customer_reviews.author: Ada W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality PC Port
customer_reviews.text: While the original PS3/XBox 360 version was fun, this PC port is poorly done. Of not 5.1 sound does not work properly (most sound is played mono out of the left or right speaker, though supposedly using SPDIF connections might help) and bugs and crashes abound.
customer_reviews.author: NimitsTexan

customer_reviews.title: Unleashed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game. It was really the first shift into this style of star wars games that was to come. Lets you truly explore both light and dark side and choose your own destiny.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Mungus

customer_reviews.title: fun game if you use a controller
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this game a lot. I started playing with just a mouse and keyboard but it was terrible. Luckily I had an xbox controller for windows laying around so I tried it out and it "made" the game for me. This game relies on lots of keystroke combos for special moves and without them I don't think it's possible to beat the game. Overall I would say the game was too easy on the "difficult/hard" setting. Some parts were overly challenging but overall the character is very overpowered. I also thought it was too short. The added content with this edition was fun though too namely Hoth and Mos Eisley.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Top of the food chain
customer_reviews.text: Like any Star Wars game, it is at the top of the food chain, the story is compiling, I couldn't wait to see what was around the next bend, Our Hero brings the force to life and shows just how bad a Sith could be. The fighting is well played and keeps you pined to the screen. This game was made to be played on consoles, where, because of the design of the controllers you have the ability to truly unleash the force, however on a PC with the keyboard and mouse, the force of everyone is unleashed on you. A PC with a game controller would be the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game. Big Crazy Action. Great for Star Wars Fans. Downloading the Patch is a Must.
customer_reviews.text: This game is very fun, the things you can do with the force powers are insane. The major thing needed is that you need to download the latest Patch for the PC version of this game if you want the best, full experience. Without the patch, I was having sound, audio problems and the graphics weren't very detailed. After installing the 450mb patch online, all the problems were fixed and the game looks and sounds great. Other than that, it's a very enjoyable game, and takes some time to master all the moves and combos.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sotomayor

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PS2 VERSION
customer_reviews.text: Very good game; but nothing like the ps2 version I loved so much. The cutscenes, levels, and even basic mechanics of the game have been altered. It still seems to tell the same story but I wanted a PC playable copy of the ps2 game
customer_reviews.author: Jules Grace

customer_reviews.title: somewhat satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are great. Controls are good. But could have been much better. Find myself running in the wrong direction. The force control for picking up and throwing objects is way to touchy. Little objects are impossible to accurately control. Im not a big fan of puzzle games. And found this ones a bit challenging for me. But none the less, Still entertaining. But the objectives should be more clear. Find myself guessing a lot and finding things by mistake. I never did have much patience for these types of games. The fighting come off a bit stiff. And the action is hit and miss. I would suggest renting this but not buying as I have.
customer_reviews.author: Alan McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! one of the best action star wars games out there
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge star wars fan! So, this game was just another plus. I remember when it first came out. The graphics were just amazing. The plot is also really good. You should definitely try this one if you haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Grad student

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no issues! Just tweak Win 10 compatibility and it works on PC! :)))
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Milnes III

customer_reviews.title: Graphics seemed good. Interesting breakable items during gameplay
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get very far into the game. It didn't really engage me. Graphics seemed good. Interesting breakable items during gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seller did excellent everything came in a great timely manner but unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller did excellent everything came in a great timely manner but unfortunately he is not able to play the game like he thought it would be he can't get things to do what they're supposed to or what he thought they were supposed to in these quite disappointed unfortunately.. I don't know whether it's because the game is an older game and the graphics and everything are different or what.. But everything else was just great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good game
customer_reviews.text: Even with the update to the game I found it buggy at times. I ensured it wasn't my system with the issue as I have a separate PC running only win7 64bit pro edition. unless you use an Xbox controller on some of bosses they may prove to be quite difficult
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Moering

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Fun
customer_reviews.text: I do not disagree with people who say this game has glitches. It has many. However the game gives you an awe inspiring amount of power, a decent story line, and ok controls to make up for it. It is not the best star wars game out there yet it is a lot of fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: As a Star Wars fan I was looking forward to play The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition for PC. I already had The Force Unleashed for PSP and it looks way better and it is more playable than the PC Sith Edition. I was really expecting more from the graphics on PC. Moreover, time to time the "enemy" units are not responding and to continue the game, some times, you have to restart your last save, which cam be irritating. Bottom line: PSP The Force Unleashed is better than PC Sith Edition.
customer_reviews.author: Nordics

customer_reviews.title: To the inexperienced parents, gamers- this runs on Direct X9
customer_reviews.text: This is an old game and I knew that when I purchased it for my 10 year old son. What I didn't realize..(shame on me) was that there would be a Direct X incompatibility with a "newer" PC. Our other programs run on Direct X 11 and downloading a lower version will cause those programs to slow down or stop....so AFTER this purchase - I discovered that the game is available on Steam. This seller gave us perfect condition discs that loaded perfectly- we just couldn't run them. Which is my fault due to my lack of knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: me644

customer_reviews.title: Great game and story
customer_reviews.text: Great game and story!!!. Some bugs managing the character. One con is that eats a lot of HDD space (over 30 GB of space) so be aware to have enough space!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Steinklauber

customer_reviews.title: Only issues are a few bugs in the game's programming ...
customer_reviews.text: Only issues are a few bugs in the game's programming but the small issues don't take away from playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. X

customer_reviews.title: Greates PC Game
customer_reviews.text: Although I am not used to PC games, I will say that this is the best one I have played in a while. The action is good, the storyline is great. The only problem that I have with it is that it doesn't take any other controller except the Xbox 360's.
customer_reviews.author: Celori_TinuviélYT

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: love the game. Great to work with and got everything on time and in good state. I would use them again if I buy something else that they have for sale.
customer_reviews.author: John S Chisum

customer_reviews.title: Very good graphics !
customer_reviews.text: Looks good while playing and challenging enough to keep you interested in playing .DID NOT LIKE THE ENDING OF THIS GAME !!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky G. Heard Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great PC Game
customer_reviews.text: My kids (boys, age 12) love this game. I wondered if it would be too slow on the computer, but it works great. Good graphics and plenty of levels to play for hours...
customer_reviews.author: e. reed

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this game and have spent 100 hours playing and ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game and have spent 100 hours playing and replaying the levels. It has some really good graphics and video scenes.
customer_reviews.author: saychoss

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's very realistic...maybe too realistic for me...with the violence, and sound effects. But my son loves it. And, at least there's no gore.
customer_reviews.author: audchild

customer_reviews.title: Such a bad port
customer_reviews.text: The game would be SO MUCH BETTER if it didn't suffer SERIOUS slowdown. There are no options to adjust video settings, and it runs in slow motion. My computer is admittedly not top of the line, but it is STILL a powerful computer able to run nearly any game out there. It certainly met the min. requirements for the game. This is a piss poor port of the game to pc, and I hope the developers get their act together when they make part 2.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kouvatsos

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: subject says it best. ya its limited on action, but overall its a fun game and great graphics if your computer can handle
customer_reviews.author: Rollin Menz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a must have for star wars fans. Awesome gameplay, good story, intense force and saber duels. It is all around very entertaining. Nicely made too.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it to anyone who wants to buy and play ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it to anyone who wants to buy and play this game. Both discs are in good condition without scratches. They are also working. It is worth ordering from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didnt work..
customer_reviews.text: the game looks fun and the graphics look amazing.. but honestly, i thought i had a pretty update computer and everything.. but after installing the game.. i'd start playing.. i run a few yards.. and the game froze.. i read up on some of the problems that the game had and tried to fix it but.. useless.. should've listened to the other reviews.. at least i didnt spend 50 buck huh?
customer_reviews.author: Yeng

customer_reviews.title: More frustrating than fun
customer_reviews.text: I heard that the controls were back, but thought I would give it a try since I am a fan of Star Wars and prior Lucas Arts games, but this is absolute rubbish on the pc. Got hung up on bringing down the Star Destroyer for probably a couple hours because the instruct script to move on is flawed at the end of it. Finally decided that all I was getting from it was irritated, exited and uninstalled. Worst money I have wasted in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Force
customer_reviews.text: I like the force powers and the story line. But I didn't like haveing to turn with the mouse, unlike all of the other star wars games that used th "A" and "D" keys for left and right. I also didn't like the ending, I'm not a martar.
customer_reviews.author: Adhem Waqas

customer_reviews.title: perfect game, value for money
customer_reviews.text: perfect game , value for money , fast shipping , good condition
customer_reviews.author: nikoskokos10

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a god
customer_reviews.text: Great use of force power, really makes you feel like a Jedi-killing machine. Lightsaber combat can get aggravating though, I ended up spamming lightning at bosses a lot of the time but the set pieces are pretty fantastic. Lots of fun, and if you like the game the extra levels are pretty sweet too
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome,one of the best games ever made,not just one of the best Star Wars games but one of the best video games ever.PERIOD.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious Gamer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent graphics
customer_reviews.text: In some parts of the game the character of Starkiller is the only visible thing on screen but that is because of my pc requirements, the game is so addictive
customer_reviews.author: Leoncio Fallas

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: This game was amazing though you may want to cheack out your computer and the sistem qualifications on the game before you buy it. Even with the random skips because of my computer it was still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jaggedfell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR PC
customer_reviews.text: Bought the PC version of this game for my son. We are both avid Star Wars and Star Wars Games fans and we were looking forward to playing this one. What a disappointment! The gameplay is painfully slow, even on a PC that meets the game requirements. I looked for some help online to make this more playable and was surprised by the number of negative reviews and support questions regarding this game. Found a lot of different suggestions, but not one worked for us. I'm shocked that a brand like Lucas Arts would publish a product like this! We'll stick to the WII version of this game which works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very good, Short Though
customer_reviews.text: The Force Unleashed was very good, it wasn't as long as I had hoped, but it still had a great story line and graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Toto Jr.

customer_reviews.title: sky does not render in windows 8
customer_reviews.text: nice product runs fluenty seems to have a compatibility isue with my laptop(meets specifacations) case was damaged discs were fine though
customer_reviews.author: anonumous

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.  I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Developed with great detail. Interact with the beloved Vader himself. Lots of game play and great new worlds of the Star Wars universe!
customer_reviews.author: T. Snider

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: the game was shipped in the condition as specified and in a quick manner, i was very pleased with the condition of the game, i wish they would post the PC requirements for the game
customer_reviews.author: J. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: A Star Wars Fan
customer_reviews.text: I liked this game probably because of the story line. I like the characters and Starkiller's character very much. I think the graphics are very good and the game play is good too. The downside was that it was made for game systems and I'm a PC gamer. Also, there are still a couple of bugs in the game that probably won't get fixed. The Sith edition is nice because it has the DLC.
customer_reviews.author: SaRsbretta

customer_reviews.title: great game but check your video card.  NO INTEL
customer_reviews.text: This game will not work on your pc if you have an Intel brand graphics card...look online for supported cards before purchase because the game is very specific. also get a gaming controller because they did not really set the controls for the pc well. Final grievance is it will only run at 30fps, 5 stars because game is really fun and used to count as cannon in the story before disney bought star wars
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC GAME!
customer_reviews.text: Congratulations to Amazon.com, the game was delivered on time. Guys, you here to ship all kinds of stuff to Brazil! I'm a big fan o Star Wars Universe, and i was waiting for this game to be produced for PC, i've played on PS2 and XBox 360... The graphics are great, the gameplay is cool, and I have bought a XBox 360 controller for windows. Everything is working fine. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre A. Machado

customer_reviews.title: Clunky on a PC platform.
customer_reviews.text: The story was under-developed and the action keys were a little unworkable for a PC gaming platform. Would probably work better on a dedicated gaming system such as playstation or xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Cymbeline

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is totally great! Really good product. I recomend it for anyone who likes action games. Honestly I don't know why Lucasarts didn't create a PC version before and the small adaptation problems to the PC version from the video games are nothing compared to the great fun moments this game provides.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo C. Sanches

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, if it were only for a true PC
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome. Excited that is now on PC, but wish they would of adapted it to a PC. There are to many console aspects to it. Especially in the jedi "arena" fights, a joystick was in mind when created. Hard to do on a keyboard. My complaints are with lucasarts.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Smeltzer

customer_reviews.title: Clunky controls :-/
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, but as a port from a console game, the controls on the PC feel clunky and can often be frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Arty Pants

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, it's new, just one error
customer_reviews.text: The game was met on my expectations. But the game ordered didn't have ESRB on it. It had Pegi. But what matters? The game was PC and it's new. My many thanks to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: E-Genius

customer_reviews.title: Great produtc
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback...it took 13 hours to install! So had to do it at night and wait until morning to use the game.
customer_reviews.author: Meera E.

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to rate the game if there is no game to play
customer_reviews.text: I unwrap the seemingly typically wrapped game package, and was dazed to find no disc inside. Of course I waited until after 30days to first open it. Even so, how does one return something that is not there? Sorry, I know this is not a review. But I just need to vent a little somehow. I hope no one else has the same experience. I'm sure it's an awesome game.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: The best game of Star Wars!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion is the best game that Lucas Arts has created. Of course, has to be played by Star Wars fans to be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Don Quijote

customer_reviews.title: QTEs may be fine for consoles. PC gamers have higher standards :p
customer_reviews.text: Looked great to begin with. Force powers and environment destructability are great! First mini-boss - these ridiculous button press sequences showed up on screen that you have to press just right in order to finish him off. WTH? Am I playing some kiddy-style console game? This is a PC game - I don't have time for that QTE nonsense. Uninstalled and played some real games.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Great Graphics
customer_reviews.text: The graphics an special effects made the game worth playing. But to beat a game, an the bounus areas for the Sith edition in less then 2 days was a let down. I will recommend the game for the fun of killing Boba Fett, Obi-wan an Sith Lords.
customer_reviews.author: Donald surgeon

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Star WArs games ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I have played most games released by LucasArts and this ranks among the top. I don't have a single bad thing to say about this game. The downloadable content that comes free with this edition add exciting alternate stories to classic star wars, enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: PC

product_meta.title: Star Wars The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition - PC
product_meta.description: Platform:PC| Edition:Ultimate SithStar Wars The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition combines the original Star Wars The Force Unleashed videogame with three entirely new single-player levels and a host of new costumes and character models. The three new levels introduce an exciting new “what if” scenario into the Star Wars Universe and send players on dangerous missions to iconic locales such as the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, Jabba’s palace on Tatooine and into the thick of battle on the ice world of Hoth. New character models allow gamers to play as a legendary Star Wars character such as Luke Skywalker or Obi-Wan Kenobi.
feature_bullets: Use the Force like never before with devastating attacks and combos on enemies
Discover the untold story of Darth Vader's secret apprentice and the major events in the Star Wars universe after the rise of the Empire.
Digital Molecular Matter technology lets you feel the true power of the Force. Objects in the environment break, bend, shatter, splinter and shift as they would in real life.
Use the Force like never before with devastating attacks and combos on enemies
Discover the untold story of Darth Vader’s secret apprentice and the major events in the Star Wars universe after the rise of the Empire
Digital Molecular Matter technology lets you feel the true power of the Force; Objects in the environment break, bend, shatter, splinter and shift as they would in real life

Enemies are influenced by euphoria, a behavioral technology that allows characters to react in different and unique ways every time you play the game, whether they are jumping to safety or on the receiving end of your Force power and lightsaber attacks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
